name: C&F Financial Corporation
description: C&F Financial Corporation is a diversified financial services holding company headquartered in West Point, Virginia. Founded in 1984, CFFI operates primarily through its subsidiaries, which include C&F Bank, a full-service community bank, and C&F Mortgage Corporation, a residential mortgage lender. The company provides a wide range of financial products and services, including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment management. C&F Bank is dedicated to serving the financial needs of individuals and businesses in its local communities, offering services such as checking and savings accounts, loans, and credit cards. C&F Mortgage Corporation specializes in helping clients secure financing for their homes, providing a variety of mortgage options tailored to meet different needs. The company prides itself on its customer-centric approach, emphasizing personalized service and community engagement. CFFI's mission is to enhance the lives of its customers and communities by providing innovative financial solutions and building long-lasting relationships. With a commitment to sustainable practices and community development, CFFI continues to grow its footprint while maintaining a strong focus on customer satisfaction and financial stability.

seo.meta_title: C&F Financial Corporation | Comprehensive Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore C&F Financial Corporation, a leading provider of banking and mortgage services. Learn more about our commitment to customer satisfaction and community engagement.

faq.question: What services does C&F Financial Corporation offer?
faq.answer: C&F Financial Corporation offers banking services, mortgage lending, and investment management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of C&F Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: Larry G. Lichtenstein is the CEO of C&F Financial Corporation.

faq.question: Where is C&F Financial Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: C&F Financial Corporation is headquartered in West Point, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: What types of mortgages does C&F Mortgage Corporation provide?
faq.answer: C&F Mortgage Corporation provides conventional mortgages, FHA loans, and VA loans.

faq.question: When was C&F Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: C&F Financial Corporation was founded in 1984.
